name: When people on Twitter complain about their "free speech" being violated, they're literally only talking about content that harasses and calls for violence on vulnerable people. It's not good faith discourse and it's not an impulse the tech industry should capitulate to.

content.html: When people on Twitter complain about their "free speech" being violated, they're literally only talking about content that harasses and calls for violence on vulnerable people. It's not good faith discourse and it's not an impulse the tech industry should capitulate to.
content.value: When people on Twitter complain about their "free speech" being violated, they're literally only talking about content that harasses and calls for violence on vulnerable people. It's not good faith discourse and it's not an impulse the tech industry should capitulate to.
